studio.tests package¶

Submodules¶

studio.tests.test_booking module¶

studio.tests.test_booking.test_booking_with_no_slots(api_client)[source]¶

Test that booking fails if the fitness class has no available slots.

  • Creates a FitnessClass with 0 available slots.

  • Attempts to book the class.

  • Asserts the response status is 400 Bad Request.

  • Confirms the error message contains ‘No slots available’.

studio.tests.test_booking.test_get_bookings_by_email(api_client)[source]¶

Test retrieving bookings filtered by client email.

  • Creates a Client with a specific email.

  • Creates 2 bookings associated with that client.

  • Sends GET request to /api/bookings/?email=<email>.

  • Asserts the response status is 200 OK.

  • Confirms exactly 2 bookings are returned.

studio.tests.test_booking.test_successful_booking(api_client)[source]¶

Test creating a successful booking for a fitness class with available slots.

  • Creates a FitnessClass with 5 available slots.

  • Posts booking data to the /api/book/ endpoint.

  • Asserts that the response status is 201 Created.

  • Checks that exactly one Booking object is created in the database.

studio.tests.test_classes module¶

studio.tests.test_classes.test_get_classes_with_timezone_filter(api_client)[source]¶

Test fetching fitness classes with a timezone query parameter.

  • Creates a FitnessClass instance.

  • Sends a GET request to /api/classes/?timezone=Asia/Kolkata.

  • Asserts that the response status is 200 OK.

  • Verifies that the endpoint handles timezone filtering correctly.

studio.tests.test_classes.test_get_upcoming_fitness_classes(api_client)[source]¶

Test retrieving a list of upcoming fitness classes.

  • Creates two FitnessClass instances with future start times.

  • Sends a GET request to /api/classes/.

  • Asserts that the response status is 200 OK.

  • Asserts that two fitness classes are returned in the response.

studio.tests.test_clients module¶

studio.tests.test_clients.test_get_all_clients(api_client)[source]¶

Test retrieving the list of all registered clients.

This test uses model_bakery to create 3 dummy Client instances, then sends a GET request to the /api/clients/ endpoint.

Asserts:

  • The response status code is 200 (OK).

  • The response contains exactly 3 clients.
